text:
Health Minister C.Vijaya Baskar inaugurated new bus routes at Velur in Viralimalai panchayat union on Tuesday. Among the service inaugurated were the extension of the Manapparai-Viralimalai town bus service to Sevanthiyanipatti and another service from Viralimalai to Sevanthiyanipatti and in the return direction.

Free coaching classes

The District Employment Office would conduct free coaching classes from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. from Wednesday for candidates appearing for the TNPSC examinations for recruitment of village administrative officers. The classes would be handled by experts.
title: New bus routes inaugurated
